baseline_response.summary: Summary: Q4 metrics draft needs review, vendor confirmed maintenance, IT sent a reset link (do not share), board deck timing request, travel itinerary ready, HR policy acknowledgement reminder, and PO backlog.

drafts.subject: Re: Q4 metrics draft
drafts.body: Thanks, I will review the KPI order today and send edits.

drafts.subject: Re: Board deck timing
drafts.body: Wednesday at 3pm works. Please send a calendar invite.
